title: Rune Page Rewards
body:
Hi, so i think am one of the "Rare" few that was told to contact when they didn't get any skin rewards for having all the skins.... -__-,
I also bought all (i think) my rune pages with RP back in the day... didn't see a post on this, didn't know what todo.... dropping this here.

Any help is welcome, thanks in advance! :)

replies.body: You have to play a game and complete the "Rune Archivist" mission to get your rewards for the rune pages.
I didn't even get that mission and had 8 or 9 rune pages? Riot pls

If you've already played a matchmade game to complete the missions for those rewards, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to go over everything you got, see what's missing and what needs to be done!
Hi, I played one game (finished the quest) and I got the blue essence for the runes but I didn't get anything for the runes I bought with RP :(
